Dating: 3RD INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not before); 3RD INTERMEDIATE PERIOD; LATE PERIOD (not after)
Technique: BURNED; PAINTED; PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL
Name: Anepigraphic shabti
Description: Very crude anepigraphic shabti in the form of a mummy. The hands are joined on the breast, holding agricultural equipment. There are remnants of white paint on the surface.
